name: WildShape
description: Easy shapeshift for your PCs/NPCs.Can be used for both PC and NPC to shape shift into either a PC or an NPC alt-double clicking on the shape shifted token will open the relative pc/npc sheet so that you can run actions from your new shape automatically: * DRUIDS ONLY:/r   - copy INT/WIS/CHA attributes to NPCs/r   - set corrected saving throws and skills considering proficiencies according to 5e rules/r   - check and decrease a configurable wild shape resource/r * change the token size/r * set hp/ac/speed (or any other attribute you might want) on bar1/2/3 when you shapeshift/r * setup senses (e.g. light, vision) from darkvision/blindsight info on NPCs, can set defaults and overrides per shape/r * change roll settings on NPC sheet (when transforming from a PC) to never whisper, toggle advantage, don't autoroll damage/r * show journal entries to players for all their shapes/r * change the token to the last taken shape when dropping a new shifter token (e.g. from the journal or copy/paste, useful when moving between maps)/r * shapes can be mass imported from a journal folder All data can be setup through menus. Forum thread: https://app.roll20.net/forum/permalink/8856337/  Full documentation here: https://github.com/ocangelo/roll20/tree/master/WildShape
